original_text: And though they found in him no guilt worthy of death, they asked Pilate to have him executed.
korean_text: 죽일 죄를 하나도 찾지 못하였으나 빌라도에게 죽여 달라 하였으니

sentences.original_text: And though they found in him no guilt worthy of death,
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 그들이 그에게서 사형에 합당한 죄를 발견하지 못했지만,

sentences.original_text: they asked Pilate to have him executed.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 빌라도에게 그를 처형해 달라고 요청했습니다.
